input.sentences: i wanted to make sure i knew the route before our adventure .
the scenery outside was a little gloomy but very green .
we certainly ran into a lot of corn .
we had a great view from the highway where we were
we stopped at a cool looking farmhouse too .
output.sentences: The woman embarked on an adventure into the country riding a train.
She stared out into the scenery, considering her life as she looked out at the dreary landscape.
She remembered her early years as a corn farmer's child as she passed field after field.
She got into a car to drive the final leg of her journey to visit her home.
As she approached her childhood home, she was filled with emotion.
